news.title: Album Review: The Black Keys, No Rain, No Flowers
news.summary: Grammy Award-winning duo return with eclectic 13th LP. 7.5/10

news.title: FILM OF THE WEEK: Weapons - Reviewed by Roe mcDermott
news.summary: Twisty, atmospheric thriller stars dazzlingly before veering into silly town.

news.title: Oasis in '02: "We ain’t gonna write fucking Kid A or whatever the fuck it was called. That’s not us"
news.summary: Ahead of Oasis’s sold-out Croke Park shows on August 16 & 17, we’re taking a deep-dive into the Hot Press archives – to hear Liam and Noel's incredible story in their own words...

news.title: Album Review: For Those I Love, Carving The Stone
news.summary: Sublime, caustic spoken word-raps from Choice Prize-winning artist. 9/10
